description: Product Description This product was exhibited at MCM Comic Con in the UK! [RERIABLE CENTERING TOOL] Made in Japan, Japanese quality card grading kit. Black & White 2 pcs set. Compatible with all cards from light to dark colors. [EASY-TO-SEE GUIDE LINES] [RELIABLE JAPANESE QUALITY] [HIGH TRANSPARENCY AND SCRATCH RESISTANCE] [for Standard Size Cards (2.5 x 3.5 inches)] "trading cards" "One Piece cards" "Magic The Gathering (MTG)" "Duel Masters tcg" Applicable Sports cards, etc. Card Grading : PSA, ARS, BGS, CGC Product Contents : Centering Tool, Black and White, 2pcs, Instruction manual / centering ratio table Clear guide frame 2 colors : Black & White Centering Tool Pro ■HOW TO USE 1. Align the guide frame of the centering tool with the edge of the card. 2. Measure the distances from the edge of the card to the inner frame, Top/Bottom and Right/Left. 3. Consult the top/bottom (bottom/top) and left/right (right/left) values in the ratio table shown on the back of the package. PSA10 (GEM-MT) is up to 60/40% (red) on the face, 75/25% on the back of the card.
